shortDescription: You'll find the Davion munitions factory at the coordinates I've outlined, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Take it from them, that it may serve as the bait for the trap that I'm paying you to set.
longDescription: You heard the man, {COMMANDER.FirstName}. This deployment is just setup for a larger fight to come, so try not to get too beat up out there.

objectiveList.title: Scout the Munitions Factory
objectiveList.description: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Davion Garrison
objectiveList.description: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.

objectiveList.title: Occupy the Munitions Factory
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.

objectiveList.title: Hold Out As Enemies Counterattack
objectiveList.description: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.

objectiveList.title: Pacify the Surrounding Area
objectiveList.description: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

objectiveList.title: Eliminate the Davion Reinforcements
objectiveList.description: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.

objectiveList.title: Eliminate the Factory's Defensive Turrets
objectiveList.description: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.

dialogueContent.words: The Davion munitions factory should be just ahead of your lance, Commander.
Regrettably, I don't have any reliable intel to share regarding your OpFor's strength or composition. I would recommend scouting ahead before engaging the facility's defenders.
And remember, Commander: this drop is only the beginning. You're going to have another fight ahead of you, so try not to take any unnecessary risks.
Excellent work, Commander! Most excellent work indeed. The munitions factory is yours, and our trap has been set. Now all we need do is sit back and wait.
You are defeated, Commander. And I am extremely disappointed.
[GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
[GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
Uh, Boss, I'm seeing new energy signatures lighting up all over the factory. If their static defenses weren't online before, they are now.
It was bound to happen sooner or later. Get on those turrets, {COMMANDER.FirstName}â€”I'll call out any more hostiles as I see 'em.
Okay, I've got eyes on the munitions factory. I'd recommend approaching with caution; I can't see anything else moving out there, but that could change in a hurry if you're not careful.
